column1: Maya has the opportunity to implement a cutting-edge
column2: energy-efficient lighting system throughout the city.;The new lighting system drastically reduces the city's energy consumption and lowers light pollution
column3: contributing to a clearer night sky and energy conservation.;However
column5: the intense brightness and specific wavelength of the new lights disrupt the natural nocturnal behaviors of local wildlife
column6: leading to ecological imbalances.;Maya's colleague is planning to introduce a new digital billboard campaign throughout the city
column7: which would use bright lights and would similarly disturb local wildlife.;The city is mandated to adopt new security measures that include installing high-intensity lights in several parks
column8: which will cause the same disruption to nocturnal wildlife.
